summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackCraft your dream lashes with greater variety & customization to achieve a new level of advanced lash artistry at home with Kiss's Falscara Studio Lash Extension Kit. Stack, mix, & match 3 wisp designs, 3 band widths, & 3 lash lengths for limitless lash extension styles that last up to 14 days.
details: DetailsFeaturesLash clusters wear for up to 14 days with new BondBoost - with no damage to natural lashesExtra lightweight wisps for easy, comfortable stacking & layeringLash clusters go under your natural lashes for a seamless, natural lookAvailable in 3 types of band size (2, 4, & 6mm)3 types of wisp style (light, fluffy, & spiky)3 lengths (8-10mm, 10-12mm, 12 - 14mm)Includes54 'Delicate' lash clusters, light volume, 8-12mm, on 3 replaceable palettesInfuseBondWater-Resistant SealBondBoostHydro CleanserPrecision ApplicatorItem 2633724How To UseBrush on InfuseBond.Place wisps under your natural lashes with the Precision Applicator.Lock in with Water-Resistant Seal.Brush on BondBoost to extend wear time up to 14 days.Remove with Hydro CleanserPrecautions: KEEP OUT OF THE REACH OF CHILDREN.IngredientsINFUSEBOND: Acrylates/Ethylhexyl Acrylate Copolymer, Water (Eau), Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, AMP-Acrylates Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Ceteareth-25, Sodium Carbonate, Sorbitol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Ascorbic Acid, Urea, Disodium Phosphate, Denatonium Benzoate, Biotin, Black 2 (CI 77266); WATER RESISTANT SEAL: Water, Polyurethane-11, Acrylates Copolymer, PPG-2 Methyl Ether, Butylene Glycol, PEG-400, Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Pentylene Glycol, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose Stearoxy Ether, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin.; BONDBOOST: Water, Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates/Ethylhexyl Acrylate Copolymer, Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Polyurethane-11, Phenoxyethanol, PPG-2 Methyl Ether, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose Stearoxy Ether, Isopropyl Alcohol, Panthenol, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Laureth-21, Pentylene Glycol, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Black 2.; HYDRO CLEANSER: Isododecane, Water, Dimethicone, Dipropylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Chloride, Propanediol, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Camellia Japonica Flower Extract, Disodium EDTA, Tromethamine, Butylene Glycol, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Paeonia Suffruticosa Root Extract.
how_to_use: Brush on InfuseBond.Place wisps under your natural lashes with the Precision Applicator.Lock in with Water-Resistant Seal.Brush on BondBoost to extend wear time up to 14 days.Remove with Hydro CleanserPrecautions: KEEP OUT OF THE REACH OF CHILDREN.

reviews.headline: Not water resistant
reviews.comments: Not a satisfied customer

reviews.headline: lashes fell out
reviews.comments: i like the lashes and the application, they stay on for a while. but i used the remover and my natural lashes started falling out… i wish i could put a picture to show. i think ill keep usijg the lashes but i'll probably remove the glue a different way. the remover acctually works really well except for the fact my natural lashes came off with the glue

reviews.headline: Great lashes, needs a better bond
reviews.comments: Love the look of these lashes and how you can experiment with different lash types and lengths. It's also a great case for organizing any future lash sets! I don't love this bond. I found it messy and hard to apply and take off, but you can get a different one for not much more money. Overall, a nice intro to lash extensions.

reviews.headline: They look great but Only last about 4 days
reviews.comments: lasting only 4 days not as long as it says and once they feel off it was hard to take off glue off my natural lashes

reviews.headline: This will be the one now
reviews.comments: I absolutely love these clusters

reviews.headline: BEST EVER!
reviews.comments: i went to an amusement park with these on and they did not budge! i had them on for 2 days prior even! this will definitely be my new go to!

reviews.headline: Skip these
reviews.comments: I generally love Falscara as an easy to apply, natural look, alternative to strip lashes. They don't last long so I eas excited to see a new kit that promotes staying power. I didnt need an entire new kit since I already had a couple bonds, seals, and removers. But I was eager to spend the extra cash if it meant it would extend the wear on my favorite quick lash. The new lengths and volumes are wonderful, but I am completely disappointed with the lack of longevity. These come off with water quicker than the regular ones. And yes, I used all the adhesives.

reviews.headline: Definitely not 14 day wear but cute for a day?
reviews.comments: There's most definitely a learning curve to these and it took me a while to get them looking semi good. These are DEFINITELY not 14 day wear unless you sleep with your open? Might as well get real lash extensions at that point. I did like the variety of lashes in this kit. I think it might be worth it for a day maybe 2 (if you can make them last that long), but at that point I might as well buy lash sections and apply them like regular false lashes. They're cute.

reviews.headline: Takes time
reviews.comments: I have paid so much money over the years for lash extensions. Decided to try this and there is definitely a learning curve. I'm a side sleeper so these don't really last very long for me. Not sure it's worth the time and hassle- but I love lashes!

reviews.headline: Horribly difficult to apply
reviews.comments: I'm a fan of normal falscara but this bond is HORRIBLE. Its so thin and sticky and the lashes don't want to stick well because they're so wispy. I'll be lucky to get three applications out of this because so many lashes are a waste if they don't stick the first time. I'll use normal falscara again but I would never purchase this again.

reviews.headline: I'm obsessed
reviews.comments: These are amazing. I'm in day 3 of wear and they are still going strong!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Would buy more

reviews.headline: I never buy the. Product again
reviews.comments: Bad product

reviews.headline: DO NOT BUY THIS
reviews.comments: If you're interested in clumpy lashes and a free eyelash waxxing then this product is for you!! I have seriously never been so disappointed in a product in my life. The bonder will make your eyelashes clump together and no matter how many false lashes you put on, your own clumpy lashes will be the shining star of the show. Oh and on top of that, you put on 2 more bond and seal layers to make the lashes look even worse! The idea if this product sounds so great but the end result is just trash. Save your money and go buy a good mascara. Im grateful that I bought an eyelash growth serum in the same order because lord knows I need it after this mess.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I really like the supplies provided. My first try was a bit hard, but the second time was easier. I like the curl and that they are nor heavy.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I really like the supplies provided. My first try was a bit hard, but the second time was easier. I like the curl and that they are nor heavy.

reviews.headline: Horrible
reviews.comments: Not beginner friendly. no matter how much I followed the directions they would not work. dont recommend.

reviews.headline: Save your money
reviews.comments: The lashes looked pretty in the casing, but once I put them on, I couldn't believe how short they were, and then on top of that even with all the extra bond it comes with for "extra hold" my lashes literally started coming off within 12 hours of putting everything on. Complete waste of time and money. for the love of God just save your money.
I bought and i loved how easy it was to apply but not even 30 minutes later my eyes were swelling up and had to take them off immediately. maybe it was just me that caused a reaction to it.

reviews.headline: amazing
reviews.comments: these lashes are so soft and so lightweight you cant feel them sitting on your lashes. the remover gets off all the old bond so easily, even bonds from othee brands i love this kit

faceoff_positive.comments:
This is the perfect eyelash kit. You get so much variety and can create so many unique and more personalized lash combinations. These are pretty easy to apply but I would recommend watching videos for tips and tricks just so you know how to properly do it efficiently. I would also recommend a spot test on your skin for the glues just in case you are sensitive. 

Now to the lashes. They claim they last up to 14 days of wear and I can't testify to that because I never had them on for more than a few days. Although they were comfortable and they actually stayed on with no problems for a few days (correct application is key to their longevity) I didn't like to have them on for more than a few days because you do have to be careful around them and I just like being able to freely wash and rub my eyes. You have to make sure to avoid cleansers and makeup removers with oils in them because that would affect the glue and even though it wouldn't completely take them off it would cause lifting and things to just not look good. On that note, using the provided lash remover is very important to guarantee you are getting all the glue off and to avoid damaging your actual lashes. With the provided lash remover it was very easy to take them off. They also claim that you can re-wear them up to 3 times with proper care and I would say that really depends on the state of the eyelashes after you take them off and if you are able to actually clean them properly. I also liked that you can buy the lash refills separately so you don't have to buy the whole kit and you can just buy the lashes you prefer.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great kit with so much variety

faceoff_negative.comments:
Okay, I was SO excited about these. I was however quickly humbled by the application process. My first try lasted well over an hour, and left my eyes burning and raw. The remover oil does take it all off relatively easy and quickly, I was thankful for that. After 3 days I tried again and got one eye beautifully applied on the first try! I moved onto the second, which didn't come out AS beautiful, but still not bad. However by this point the glue and sealant that was seeping into my eyeballs burned so bad I could barely stand it. Be careful how much you use because even a tiny bit coming off the lashes and in your eyes is trouble. The more my eyes watered the more loose and unstable the lashes felt for me. They lasted all day and into the evening. I made pasta for dinner and the steam from the pot did me in. They had to come off, I couldn't stand the feeling that they were half attached. I took this as an opportunity to practice thinking maybe I didn't adhere them well enough since I was so afraid off too much glue and burning me eyes. I reapplied them the next morning, which now only took me about 30 minutes, and they looked OK but not nearly as clean and cute as my friends who go to a tech for this type of thing. I slept in them overnight and lost one cluster of lashes to my pillow but the rest stayed in place. I cannot attest to the fact that these can be worn for two weeks because after one night my eyes were so done with me they sent me a certified letter stating to knock this eyelash thing off immediately-

I wanted to love these but they're not for me. They're packaged beautifully, the lashes themselves aren't bad, but they're adhesive and the application process is a learning curve I haven't figured out how to overcome yet. When I'm brave and confident enough, I'll probably still try again, so they're not totally bad. Give them a try but be prepared!
faceoff_negative.headline: A real struggle but cute once you finally get it!
